name: pstree
description: Displays hierarchical parent-child relationships of running processes.

name: dlllist
description: Lists loaded DLLs for each process to spot rogue modules.
output:
csrss.exe (PID 612)
  0x3000 csrss.exe
  0x4000 kernel32.dll  # common system library

name: netscan
description: Scans for active network connections and sockets.
output:
Proto LocalAddr          ForeignAddr         State
TCP   0.0.0.0:80         0.0.0.0:0           LISTENING
UDP   127.0.0.1:53       0.0.0.0:0           NONE
TCP   192.168.1.5:445    192.168.1.10:51234  ESTABLISHED  # outbound SMB

name: malfind
description: Detects memory regions with characteristics of injected code.
output:
PID   Address     Protection Description
612   0x7f12a000  RWX        Injected Code  # suspect
700   0x401000    RWX        Suspicious Section

name: yara
description: Matches memory content against YARA signatures.
output:
PID  Rule             Address    Heuristic
612  SuspiciousAPIs   0x401000   suspicious
248  EncodedPayload   0x500000   malicious  # encoded payload
